name: Immortal Tactics: War of the Eternals
storyline:
Experience a Fast-Paced Roguelite Turn-Based Strategy game with a New Turn-Based Engine which will need you to plan early on and create strategies that would lead your army to victory. Create an army with different Characters and Leaders to choose from and explore this Roguelite world.

A new turn based engine is incorporated in the game allowing you to have more interesting choices and strategies to create. It's not the usual move & attack with units and simply alternating with each unit - Phases are now implement with each turn for each Team is used. With this new engine, you are able to plan carefully on what your next action would be - choose your moves wisely!

Get to master different units with each character being unique and different with lots of possible options and moves to choose from - use your characters wisely! Aside from the units in play, your Leader will guide you throughout your journey by providing skills and magic to make your journey a success.
summary: Experience a Fast-Paced Roguelite Turn-Based Strategy game with a New Turn-Based Engine which will need you to plan early on and create strategies that would lead your army to victory. Create an army with different Characters and Leaders to choose from and explore this Roguelite world.
